item.title: [ncc] Windgrace's Judgment
item.description:
Instant

For any number of opponents, destroy target nonland permanent that player controls.

item.title: [ncc] Currency Converter
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever you discard a card, you may exile that card from your graveyard.

{2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

{T}: Put a card exiled with Currency Converter into your graveyard. If it's a land card, create a Treasure token. If it's a nonland card, create a 2/2 black Rogue creature token.

item.title: [ncc] Artisan of Kozilek
item.description:
Creature — Eldrazi

When you cast this spell, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)

item.title: [ncc] False Floor
item.description:
Artifact

False Floor enters the battlefield tapped.

Creatures enter the battlefield tapped.

{2}, {T}, Exile False Floor: Exile all untapped creatures. Exile only as a sorcery.

item.title: [ncc] Gavel of the Righteous
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a charge counter on Gavel of the Righteous.

Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each counter on Gavel of the Righteous.

As long as Gavel of the Righteous has four or more counters no it, equipped creature has double strike.

Equip—Pay {3} or remove a counter from Gavel of the Righteous.

item.title: [ncc] Weathered Sentinels
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Wall

Defender, vigilance, reach, trample

Weathered Sentinels can attack players who attacked you during their last turn as though it didn't have defender.

Whenever Weathered Sentinels attacks, it gets +3/+3 and gains indestructible until end of turn.

item.title: [ncc] Currency Converter
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever you discard a card, you may exile that card from your graveyard.

{2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

{T}: Put a card exiled with Currency Converter into your graveyard. If it's a land card, create a Treasure token. If it's a nonland card, create a 2/2 black Rogue creature token.

item.title: [ncc] Smuggler's Buggy
item.description:
Artifact — Vehicle

Hideaway 4 (When this enchantment enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

Whenever Smuggler's Buggy deals combat damage to a player, you may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost. If you do, return Smuggler's Buggy to its owner's hand.

Crew 2

https://www.wargamer.com/magic-the-gathering/streets-of-new-capenna-commander-deck-maestros-massacre-reveal

Defender, vigilance, reach, trample

Whenever Weathered Sentinels attacks, it gets +3/+3 and gains indestructible until end of turn.

item.title: [ncc] Bloodthirsty Blade
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and is goaded. (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

{1}: Attach Bloodthirsty Blade to target creature an opponent controls. Activate only as a sorcery.

item.title: [ncc] Everflowing Chalice
item.description:
Artifact

Multikicker {2}

Everflowing Chalice enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each time it was kicked.

{T}: Add {C} for each charge counter on Everflowing Chalice.

item.title: [ncc] Dimir Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}: Add {U}{B}.

item.title: [ncc] Crystalline Giant
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Giant

At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose a kind of counter at random that Crystalline Giant doesn't have on it from among flying, first strike, deathtouch, hexproof, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, vigilance, and +1/+1. Put a counter of that kind on Crystalline Giant.

item.title: [ncc] Commander's Sphere
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.

item.title: [ncc] Idol of Oblivion
item.description:

{T}: Draw a card. Activate only if you created a token this turn.

item.title: [ncc] Fellwar Stone
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

item.title: [ncc] Power Conduit
item.description:
Artifact

{T}, Remove a counter from a permanent you control: Choose one —

• Put a charge counter on target artifact.

• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

item.title: [ncc] Oracle's Vault
item.description:
Artifact

{2}, {T}: Exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card. Put a brick counter on Oracle's Vault.

{T}: Exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost. Activate only if there are three or more brick counters on Oracle's Vault.

item.title: [ncc] Oblivion Stone
item.description:
Artifact

{4}, {T}: Put a fate counter on target permanent.

{5}, {T}, Sacrifice Oblivion Stone: Destroy each nonland permanent without a fate counter on it, then remove all fate counters from all permanents.

item.title: [ncc] Mimic Vat
item.description:
Artifact

Imprint — Whenever a nontoken creature dies, you may exile that card. If you do, return each other card exiled with Mimic Vat to its owner's graveyard.

{3}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of a card exiled with Mimic Vat. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

item.title: [ncc] Solemn Simulacrum
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Golem

When Solemn Simulacrum enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

When Solemn Simulacrum dies, you may draw a card.
